📍 IIT Gandhinagar | 📆 **02–13 June 2025**

::: {.panel-tabset}
<!-- Tabs auto-generated via JS -->
<div id="tabset-container">Loading schedule...</div>
:::

<script src="https://d3js.org/d3.v7.min.js"></script>

<script>
d3.csv("schedule.csv").then(function(data) {
  const dateColumns = Object.keys(data[0]).filter(d => d !== "Start Time" && d !== "End Time");

  const container = document.getElementById("tabset-container");

  dateColumns.forEach(date => {
    let html = `<div class="panel" data-title="${date}"><table><thead><tr><th>Time</th><th>Event</th></tr></thead><tbody>`;
    data.forEach(row => {
      const start = row["Start Time"] || "";
      const end = row["End Time"] || "";
      const event = row[date];
      if (event && event.trim() !== "") {
        const time = (start && end) ? `${start} – ${end}` : "";
        html += `<tr><td>${time}</td><td>${event}</td></tr>`;
      }
    });
    html += "</tbody></table></div>";
    container.innerHTML += html;
  });
});
</script>

<style>
table {
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: collapse;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}
th, td {
  padding: 6px;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  text-align: left;
}
</style>
